text: The United States presidential election in Maryland, 1968 was held on November 5, 1968. Hubert Humphrey won the state by 20,315 votes against Richard Nixon and by 359,576 votes against George Wallace. Maryland was the home state of Republican vice presidential nominee Spiro Agnew, who was the sitting Governor of Maryland at the time of the election. ==Results== {| border="1" cellpadding="4"
